text: A New Defense Team, and a New Style Last time out Mr. Cosby ’ s main lawyer was a Philadelphia courthouse veteran, Brian J. McMonagle, who had served as a prosecutor and knew the local people and the processes well. This time out, Mr. Cosby has hired more of an outsider to lead his defense : Thomas A. Mesereau Jr., a high profile criminal defense veteran who helped Michael Jackson win acquittal in his 2005 child molesting trial. Mr. Mesereau, with his white shoulder - length hair, will be a distinctive figure as the case unfolds. His team has already demonstrated his aggressiveness with its move to have Judge O ’ Neill recuse himself because his wife has been an active supporter of sexual assault victims.
